title: [Capstone] How do we select a Capstone topic?
content:
I had a few questions:

‚Ä¢After selecting a domain, how do we go about choosing our capstone topic? 

‚Ä¢Will the guides/mentors help with choosing a topic if we don't have any?

‚Ä¢Are guides/mentors more likely to accept teams that already have a topic decided?

comments.body:
\* So, after you select a domain, pick a Capstone guide, then you can request / ask your guide for an industry relevant, often they suggest list of topics, based on their experience, and research.   
\* yes  
\* possible yes, if the PS is industry relevant

The most common mistake is to not scope your project well. Profs will push you to add topics to make it sound more complicated and filled with buzzwords. It's a paper, not khichdi. Once you decide your project, have a clear idea about what you will do and more importantly, what you will not do
